description: Skill activation triggers for Claude Code. Controls when skills automatically suggest or block actions.

agent-creator.description: Create and optimize Claude Code sub-agents following Anthropic best practices

skill-developer.description: Meta-skill for creating, enhancing, and managing Claude Code skills

intentPatterns: (maybe|thinking about|could we|what if|not sure|help me think)

implementation-planner.description: Create minimal-change, reversible implementation plans with verification steps and standardized format. Automatically checks docs/plan.md for active plans before creating new ones. Supports continuing existing plans.

intentPatterns: (how should|how to|what's the best|what's the approach).*(implement|impl|build)

debugging.description: Systematic debugging - triggers when encountering errors, bugs, or things not working

playwright-skill.description: Complete browser automation with Playwright. Auto-detects dev servers, writes test scripts, handles screenshots, form filling, responsive testing, and any browser-based automation.

react-nextjs-expert.description: Expert React and Next.js development specialist. Reviews, designs, and improves modern React applications with focus on React 19 features, Next.js App Router, state management, performance optimization, and production-ready architecture patterns.

ui-design-system.description: Expert UI/UX design and development for modern web frontends. Reviews, designs, and improves interfaces using TailwindCSS, Radix UI, shadcn/ui, and modern styling systems. Focus on design systems, accessibility, and visual design patterns.

git-workflow.description: Git workflow management with atomic commit enforcement

refactoring-expert.description: Systematic code refactoring for quality improvement and technical debt reduction

project-planner.description: Create structured, actionable plans for any project type - business, personal, creative, academic, event planning, or organizational change. Use for non-programming projects. Automatically checks docs/plan.md for active plans.

k8s-ops.description: Production Kubernetes and Helm operations covering kubectl commands, cluster management, deployment strategies, troubleshooting, resource optimization, security, GitOps, RBAC, and cost optimization for production environments.

enforcement_types.suggest: Skill suggestion appears but doesn't block execution
enforcement_types.block: Requires skill to be used before proceeding (guardrail)

priority_levels.low: Optional - Trigger only for explicit matches

customization.pathPatterns: Adjust to match your project structure
customization.keywords: Add domain-specific terms relevant to your project
customization.intentPatterns: Use regex for flexible user intent matching
